pages.text: IMPORTANT:$(br)This will be one of the last 1.12.2 builds of Elementaristics, as we are currently working on a 1.14.4 port. This sadly means that 1.12.2 will be pretty incomplete for a long time, if not forever; we hope you understand. Anyways, we also hope that you have fun playing the mod!

In case you find any bugs, let it be with implemented or half-implemented content, don't hesitate to report them at the mod's github page. Make sure to always explain what happened before and to link the crash log though.
